name: RUGBY. Tijdschrift
blurb: Het eerste onafhankelijke RUGBY. tijdschrift in Nederland met journalistiek karakter. Weet wat er speelt!

name: College Startup Zine
blurb: A magazine dedicated to sharing the stories of entrepreneurs from colleges and universities globally.

name: Multi Entry - Telling the Stories of Young, Creative China
blurb: A multimedia collection of stories, interviews, and guides that vibrantly portrays the lives and worlds of young Chinese creatives.

name: Artificial Womb Zine
blurb: A feminist arts zine, which pays its contributors a fair wage. Committed to grassroots activism, leftist solidarity & saving the bees.

name: Brazen Magazine
blurb: Brazen Magazine is a feminist arts and culture magazine that celebrates and embraces the impact of women on today's culture.

name: Kickstart Curium Magazine Edition Two
blurb:
Two print editions done and our third's so much fun! 
Help Kickstart Edition Two of Curium Magazine!

name: Guide to Being Broke & Fabulous Zine

blurb: Zines about computer science! Each zine focuses on one concept & is filled with comics, diagrams, stories, examples, and exercises.

name: APPALOOSA! Mobile App Prototyping Kit for Curious Grrls.
blurb: A prototyping kit (stories, supplies, and source files) for empowering curious grrls to design & hack together their own mobile apps.

name: The Maple - A Zine About Canada
blurb: The Maple is a zine that explains Canada to people around the world who don't know very much about Canada.

name: It's Complicated: A Feminist Zine on Loving Misogynist Art
blurb: A zine and future book about feminist writers' relationships to the artists whose misogynist work we love.

name: Religion: A feminist bicycle zine
blurb: The twelfth issue of Taking the Lane explores the intersection of bicycling and religion, with surprising results.

name: Maxistentialism Zine

name: Janice Magazine: Issue 02 - 'LA Nights'

name: Monochrome Magazine
